original_text: And in the same house remain, eating and drinking such things as they give: for the labourer is worthy of his hire. Go not from house to house.
korean_text: 그 집에 유하며 주는 것을 먹고 마시라 일꾼이 그 삯을 받는 것이 마땅하니라 이 집에서 저 집으로 옮기지 말라

sentences.original_text: And in the same house remain,
eating and drinking such things as they give:
for the labourer is worthy of his hire.
Go not from house to house.
